pullRequest.title: Support for mocking CDI beans
pullRequest.bodyText:
This allows all CDI normal scoped beans to be mocked at
test time by adding a form of redirection into the client
proxy.

nodes.bodyText: You could just use QuarkusMock.installMock(mockableBean1, new HiGreeter()), right?
MockSupport is not part of the user API, or? In fact, it could be package-private...
